title: Inside the Korean TV boom that has global streamers piling into Seoul
description: Korean TV has become a global sensation, with titles like Squid Game and The Glory becoming hugely popular on Netflix. South Korea is now the largest producer of hit series globally for the streaming service outside the US, with over 60% of its customers watching a Korean show last year. Other companies have also been keen to capitalize on the success of Korean content, with Disney+ and Apple TV+ among global streaming services exploring deals to invest in the country.
keywords: south korea, korean tv shows, netflix, korean films, lee byung-chul, Parasite, warner, fact
